assignment_5_q1

类 Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment_5_q1.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    The Ship class contains the following fields: int numShip, String nameShip, double weight, int year, int capacity. The Ship class contains the following methods: the constructor method Ship, getNumShip, setNumShip, getNameShip, setNameShip, getWeight, setWeight, getYear, setYear, getCapacity, setCapacity.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Ship

        public Ship(int numShip,
            java.lang.String nameShip,
            double weight,
            int year,
            int capacity)
     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
            java.sql.SQLException
        Constructor method for the ship. Ensure the ship by the information(id, name, weight, year built and capacity) saved in the database. Ensure the sailors including the supervisor and sailors through the createSailor method.
        参数:
        numShip - the ID number of the ship
        nameShip - the name of the ship
        weight - the weight of the ship
        year - the year built of the ship
        capacity - the capacity of the ship
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Do not find the class
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL error
